attr.title: Yar's Revenge
attr.desc: A quick remake of the Atari 2600/VCS Game created by Howard Scott Warshaw.
attr.inst:
Move your Yar around with the DPAD, fire chunks out of the shield with your fire key
(A/B). You can't shoot anything else. You can also eat bits of the shield by ramming it.
When you've done this enough the cannon appears at the left side and can be used to aim at the
quotile (the triangular thing on the right) to destroy it to end the game.
